name: Colony Siege (itch)
description:
Colony Siege is a real-time strategy, survival, and base defense hybrid. Battle in a wide variety of environments to defend the last human colonies from two unique threats. Survive alone or with a friend as you progress through a non-linear campaign.

This build is a single player demo which includes the first 5 missions. Wishlist us on Steam and join our Discord group for news and updates. The Early Access version is coming to Steam in mid-July 2020. Please send us your feedback using the in-game feedback system.
